author: Stephen Bechler
text:
We at the City of Middleton (WI) are in the process of a website redesign, and are hoping to automate our bill paying functions as much as possible, while keeping them affordable.  As such, I was hoping to ascertain whether or not people have recommendations on vendors of this service--whether or not you are a customer.  I have just begun a list that includes: Payment Service Network, LexisNexis, Vanco, IntelliPay, Active Networks, Official Payments, Municipal Payments, and Pay-Ease.
In terms of parameters, I was looking at: fees per transaction (for the City & the customer), the time frame for operability, the type of services they provide (providing data for upload to Caselle, automating the entire process on customer and City accounts, etc.)
Info on the City:
Population: approx. 17,000
Using Caselle
If there is any other info I can supply that would make this question easier to answer, or if there is already a similar thread with all the information I'm asking about, I would love some feedback.
Thank you!
Stephen Bechler
City of Middleton (WI)
Administrative Intern
administration@ci.middleton.wi.us
title: Automated Payments Vendor
